data.eml:eml: Dragonfly biodiversity 90 years ago in an Alpine region: The Odonata historical collection of the MUSE (Trento, Italy)

The resource contains the data of the Catalogue of the historic (1924-1957) collection of Odonata at MUSE - Museo delle Scienze in Trento (Italy).

A total of 836 records related to dry mounted specimen adult dragonflies and damselflies preserved in the collection "Miscellanea invertebrati (cINV017) are given.
